::Slayer::

Slayer continues to fly backwards, Lunarpine's slash leaving deep 
gashes in his chest. He was losing mechfluid quicker and quicker..

"Enough of this, Maximal," he says, sending another barrauge of 
firepower at Lunarpine, "Die. I have other things to do than kill 
you."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> Lunarpine sees the opening he's created and leaps forward with a 
> powerful slash from his right claw. his body takes abuse as he 
> charges but the surge of adrenaline going through him drowns out 
the 
> pain. It was time to put an end to this battle and to the traitor 
> once and for all. Lunarpine couldn't let the fact that they once 
> served together matter. At this moment only two things mattered to 
> him. Winning or losing would be the difference between who stands 
> tall and who crawls away licking thier wounds.
> 
> 
> OOC Thank you and have a nice day.
